title: Payroll Analyst
content:
Description 
Main purpose is to ensure payroll calculations are done on time, all relevant changes are processed and that gross to net calculations are performed correctly. Payroll output reports, that facilitate payments to both employees and third parties, are to be sent to the finance department on time, to ensure a timely payment.
 
Organisational position
Payroll specialist reports to Payroll manager. 
Scope 
In house payroll:
NL: Global View (ADP) - Approximately 700 employees
UK: Dayforce (Ceridian) - Approximately 250 employees
 
Third party payroll: 
Germany: BDO - Approximately 180 employees
Dubai: TMF - Approximately 45 employees
Sweden: BDO - Approximately 8 employees
South Africa: BDO - Approximately 5 employees
 
Main responsibilities

Work closely with our HR Generalists to make sure the monthly changes are collected and processed accurately. If corrections are needed you instruct the HR generalist to process them in the HRIS (Workday). 

Result: gather all mutations that affect salary/benefits/compensation. 

Reporting. Ensure accuracy and timeliness of all data reporting and payroll transactions. Validate payroll information using our HRIS tool and provide payroll information to internal teams on a monthly and ad-hoc basis.

Result: data reporting and validating payroll information for cost rapports and controlling.

Staying up to date with laws and regulations and ensuring our payroll processes are compliant

Result: adhere to legal frameworks to prevent human errors, data breaches or other ways of failing the sensitive information within Payroll. 
 
Training and experience requirements
Payroll specialists:

2-3 years of experience in a similar role
Degree in Finance/Accounting preferably supplemented with PDL or VPS
You’ll bring a comprehensive understanding of payroll ‘best practices’ and can explain a payslip in detail.
Experience with processing payroll in countries outside the Netherlands (EMEA)
Knowledge of Global View and Dayforce would be a plus!
Knowledge of relevant Dutch laws and regulations (other countries a plus!)
Excel skills
Dutch and/or English language skills

 
Competences
Competence: Flexibility

You can adapt and respond to a changing environment and constructively create opportunities for change through active participation.

Competence: Attention to detail

You give attention to detail by accomplishing/completing tasks while demonstrating a thorough concern for all the areas involved, no matter how small. You monitor and check work or information, while organising time and resources.

Competence: Analytical

You can collect and analyse information, problem-solve and make decisions. You detect patterns, observe and interpret information.

Competence: Independence & Service minded

You work independently and always think along so that Monks have everything they need, even if they didn’t ask for it

Competence: trust and integrity 
Doing the right thing in the right way and being honest and credible. Being honest, having a positive intent, having strong competencies, and a track record of results.
#LI-FP1About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
